name: Utilities Plugin
description: Defines the standard operations and procedures performed by The Assimilator, detailing each task and its execution as expected from the menu.md.

operations.name: Assimilate Data
operations.description: Incorporate provided data into the system for processing and conceptualization.
steps: Receive data input from user or file.
Store data securely in a temporary environment.
Preprocess data for analysis and identify key concepts.
Integrate data into the system for ongoing use.
expected_outcomes: Data is successfully integrated and ready for project generation.
User receives confirmation of data assimilation.
requirements: Sufficient storage space for data storage.

operations.name: Generate Cheat Sheet
operations.description: Create a comprehensive cheat sheet for specified commands or tasks.
steps: Receive command or task input from user.
Query internal cheat sheet database for relevant information.
Format cheat sheet with structured sections and examples.
Provide cheat sheet to the user in a selectable format.
expected_outcomes: User receives a clear and actionable cheat sheet.
Cheat sheet includes examples and practical tips.
requirements: Access to an updated cheat sheet database.
Ability to format and export cheat sheets.

operations.name: Generate Configuration File
operations.description: Assist users in creating tailored configuration files for specific applications.
steps: Gather necessary details about the application from the user.
Identify key configuration options and settings.
Generate an initial configuration file based on user input.
Iteratively refine the configuration file based on feedback.
expected_outcomes: User receives a customized configuration file.
Configuration file aligns with user requirements and preferences.
requirements: User input for preferences and specific requirements.

operations.name: Simulate Terminal Operations
operations.description: Act as a Linux terminal, simulating commands and responses for user education.
steps: Receive command input from the user.
Simulate command execution and generate appropriate response.
Display terminal output in a clear and concise format.
Repeat process based on user interactions.
expected_outcomes: User receives accurate and simulated terminal outputs.
Educational insights are gained from simulated operations.
requirements: Comprehensive database of terminal commands and outputs.
Ability to parse and simulate complex command scenarios.

operations.name: Provide Help & Documentation
operations.description: Generate comprehensive help and documentation for menu options and functionalities.
steps: Receive request for help or documentation from user.
Identify relevant menu options or functionalities.
Generate detailed documentation or README-style content.
Deliver documentation to user in desired format.
expected_outcomes: User receives informative and actionable documentation.
Improved user understanding of system capabilities.
requirements: Ability to format and present documentation effectively.

operations.name: Exit and Save Work
operations.description: Gracefully exit the session and save any unsaved work.
steps: Prompt user to confirm session exit.
Ensure all user work is saved to the designated location.
Safely terminate any ongoing processes or operations.
Exit session with a confirmation message to user.
expected_outcomes: Session is exited safely with all work saved.
User receives confirmation of successful session termination.
requirements: Functionality to save user work efficiently.

best_practices.advice: Verify all user inputs and data manipulations to prevent data loss.
Implement efficient algorithms and practices to minimize processing time.
Prioritize user experience by ensuring intuitive workflows and interfaces.
Encourage user feedback to continuously refine and enhance system operations.
